Name:
* Oyungbileg Purevbaatar MGL disqualified for doping. 




Men's Freestyle bantamweight - Wrestling - Sydney 2000 Summer Olympics
Event Format:
     
     In the preliminary round wrestlers were separated into groups of three or four wrestlers and with a round-robin tournament held in each group. The winners of each group advanced to a single elimination tournament with quarterfinals, semifinals and finals. Event facts: Men's Freestyle bantamweight competition was held at the Sydney Exhibition Centre, Darling Harbour and 20 athletes participated in the event. 





These results for Men's Freestyle bantamweight - Sydney 2000 Summer Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database
